title: Royal Enfield Classic 350 'Flex Fuel' revealed, to  run on a blend of petrol and ethanol
description: Royal Enfield plans to introduce the Classic 350 'Flex Fuel' variant, which runs on a blend of petrol and ethanol. The environmentally friendly model retains the iconic design of the regular Classic 350 and features a unique color scheme. With its powerful engine and adjustable ethanol content, this new variant is expected to be popular among motorcycle enthusiasts. Stay tuned for updates on the official launch date.
